summary: A Breton based race that starts as a vampire with a few extra abilities.
descriptionHtml:
The mod adds a race of Bretons called the Dark Champions.

Skills: all +15
conjuration
alteration
destruction
light armor
one-handed
archery
lockpicking

Stats:
Health, Magic, and Stamina all +300
Health regen +4
Magic regen +4
Stamina regen +5
base carry wight +500

Specials:
Vampire (and everything that goes with that)
Dark Fist (unarmed base attack of 25)
Dark Voice (Firebreath mixed with unrelenting force. cost 87 magic)
Dark Resistance (resist fire 50%)
Dark Champion form (Berserker rage, plus 100% to regen rates, Boethiah's shadow ability, Dragur eyes. Lasts 10min )

Bug:
Once you use the Dark Champion form the Draugr eyes will not go away.
Sometimes in the race menu, the face will get stuck and you cannot change anything.

Other mod Recommendations (none required):
A Galaxy Far Far Away-Races of SW Universe (the character in the screen shots is uses eyes from this mod) http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47532/?

Glowing Red Draugr and Skeleton eyes (blue glow otherwise) http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37830/?

One-Handed Fists - One-Handed Fists v1.1
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52634/?

ApachiiSkyHair http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

Better Vampires http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9717/?

High Level Enemies http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27866/?
author: JackDack
